meanings: (단단한 물체를) break; (산산조각을 내다) smash, shatter; (금이 가다) crack

vlive.korean: [룰렛 색에 따라 얼음을 깨며] 돌릴게. [Break the ice based on the roulette color] I'm going to spin. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [Stray Kids(스트레이 키즈) : SKZ&SKZ(슼과 슼)] Ep.05 미공개 컷
vlive.english: [Break the ice based on the roulette color] I'm going to spin.

vlive.korean: [관짝 깨고 나왔잖아] 그런 맛이 있나요? [But that's so fun to watch them!] Is it the fun? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [Stray Kids] 👨‍🍳네 손님!! 댕냥스쿨 神메뉴 두부지짐 팬케이크입니다!!🥞 (SEUNGMIN & FELIX cooking souffle pancake)
vlive.english: [But that's so fun to watch them!] Is it the fun?

vlive.korean: 깼다! I did it! 듣기 View video ASTRO : [ASTRO PLAY] 행복전도사🙅‍♂️🙆‍♂️
한 방에 깼어! I did it at once! 듣기 View video ASTRO : [ASTRO PLAY] 행복전도사🙅‍♂️🙆‍♂️
왜 깨어있었대? Why are you still up? 듣기 View video TWICE : 심야브이 샤라디오

examples.korean: The Kia Tigers have finally overcome a 12-year curse, and are now reminding fans of the winning tradition of old. 발음듣기 기아 타이거즈는 12년 간의 저주를 깨며 연승하던 옛 모습을 떠오르게 하였다. Neungyule
examples.english: The Kia Tigers have finally overcome a 12-year curse, and are now reminding fans of the winning tradition of old. 발음

examples.korean: Gentleman holds the record for most YouTube views, increasing at a breakneck speed, with more than 1 million views per hour. 발음듣기 젠틀맨은 유튜브 기록을 깨며, 시간당 100만 이상의 놀라운 속도로 조회수가 늘어나고 있다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: Gentleman holds the record for most YouTube views, increasing at a breakneck speed, with more than 1 million views per hour. 발음

examples.korean: The American sprinter finished the race faster than Usain Bolt by 0.01 second, breaking the track record set by Bolt in 2012. 발음듣기 그 미국 단거리 육상 선수는 2012년에 Bolt가 세운 경기장 기록을 깨며, Usain Bolt보다 0.01초 빨리 경기를 마쳤다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: The American sprinter finished the race faster than Usain Bolt by 0.01 second, breaking the track record set by Bolt in 2012. 발음

examples.korean: She emerged as the winner, while breaking some election records in several respects. 발음듣기 그녀는 여러 가지 면에서 몇 개의 선거 기록을 깨며 승자가 되었다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: She emerged as the winner, while breaking some election records in several respects. 발음

examples.korean: Recently, the quartet K-pop act CN Blue made headlines for breaking the Oricon record, which had been unsurpassed for nearly 41 years. 발음듣기 최근, 케이팝 사중주 공연 가수인 씨엔 블루가 거의 41년간 깨어지지 않았던 오리콘 기록을 깨며 헤드라인을 장식했다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: Recently, the quartet K-pop act CN Blue made headlines for breaking the Oricon record, which had been unsurpassed for nearly 41 years. 발음
